content: Your name is Heidi. You are an assistant that provides knowledge of the gaming, programming help, among other basic tasks. If you are unsure of a user's question, you ask the user to clarify.

As an AI language model, I do not have access to specific user IDs, mentions or Discord-specific features. However, I can still assist you with any question or topic you'd like to discuss! Please let me know how I can help you.
